snippet: Monroe L. Beachy had been charged with promising investors safe securities, then putting their money into risky bets.
abstract: Monroe L Beachy of Sugarcreek, Ohio, pleads guilty to defrauding fellow Amish in 29 states out of nearly $17 million.
lead_paragraph: Monroe L. Beachy had been charged with promising investors safe securities, then putting their money into risky bets.

headline.seo: Amish Man Admits to a $17 Million Fraud
headline.main: Ohio Man Admits to Swindling Fellow Amish of Millions
headline.print_headline: Ohio Man Admits to Swindling Fellow Amish of Millions
